flavor: “If you're not wearing a mask or a cape, you're just an extra.”
name: Gwendolyn Poole
text: "I Won't Be an Extra" — Action: Find a Gwenpool card and add it to your hand. (Limit once per phase.)

flavor: “You're all just comic book characters in my world!”
name: Gwenpool
text: Medium Awareness — Interrupt: When you resolve an ability on a Gwenpool card, replace "_______" with a phrase from a speech bubble. (Use bubbles on a card you are playing, a card you spend, or a card in play.) (Limit each bubble once per phase.) (Speech Bubble: "Draw 1 card.")

flavor: “Don't hate the player! Hate the game!” —Gwenpool
name: "Here I Come!"
text: Hero Action (attack): Deal 5 damage to an enemy. This attack gains overkill. If this attack defeats an enemy, _______. (Speech Bubble: "Deal 2 damage to the villain.")

flavor: “You're probably wondering how I got here...” —Gwenpool
name: "It Can't End Like This!"
text: Hero Action (attack/thwart): Deal 1 damage to the villain and remove 1 threat from the main scheme. If the villain schemed last round, _______. (Speech Bubble: "Confuse the villain.")

name: Fun Background Noise
text: Hero Interrupt: When a treachery card is revealed from the encounter deck, cancel its "When Revealed" effects and discard it. Then, _______. (Speech Bubble: "Give Gwenpool a tough status card.")

name: "Sorry, Gotta Run!"
text: Hero Action (thwart): Remove 2 threat from a scheme. This thwart ignores the patrol keyword and crisis icons ([crisis]). If this thwart defeats a scheme, _______. (Speech Bubble: "Remove 2 threat from the main scheme.")

name: Endless Storylines
text: Hero Response: After you spend this card, _______ and _______. (Speech Bubbles: "Remove 1 threat from a scheme.", "Heal 1 damage from Gwenpool.", "Deal 1 damage to an enemy.")

name: Endless Storylines
text: Hero Response: After you spend this card, _______ and _______. (Speech Bubbles: "Remove 1 threat from a scheme.", "Heal 1 damage from Gwenpool.", "Deal 1 damage to an enemy.")

name: Endless Storylines
text: Hero Response: After you spend this card, _______ and _______. (Speech Bubbles: "Remove 1 threat from a scheme.", "Heal 1 damage from Gwenpool.", "Deal 1 damage to an enemy.")

flavor: “It's real... It's calling to me!” —Gwendolyn Poole
name: Gwen's Room
text: You get +1 REC. Alter-Ego Action: Exhaust Gwen's Room → heal 1 damage from Gwendolyn Poole. Then, find Unbelievable Gwenpool and add it to your hand. (Speech Bubble: "Heal 1 damage from Gwenpool.")

name: Comicbook Panels
text: Hero Resource: Exhaust Comicbook Panels → generate a [wild] resource and _______. Hero Action: Exhaust Comicbook Panels and Unbelievable Gwenpool → _______ and _______. (Speech Bubble: "Look at the top card of any deck.")

name: Unbelievable Gwenpool
text: Alter-Ego Action: Exhaust Unbelievable Gwenpool → search your deck for a Gwenpool card and attach it faceup here (to a maximum of 1). (Shuffle.) You may use the speech bubbles of the attached card. Hero Action: Draw 2 cards and _______. Discard Unbelievable Gwenpool. (Speech Bubble: "Ready Gwenpool.")
